feed.subtitle: ABAP Development Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: HTTP failed: INTERNAL_ERROR in SAP Gateway Client for OData Service
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I'm testing an OData service  in the SAP Gateway Client with the Request URI /sap/opu/odata/sap/.../$format=xml using a GET method. I’m encountering an "HTTP failed: INTERNAL_ERROR" message. The Error Log tab shows no additional details yet.

Could you please help me understand how to resolve this INTERNAL_ERROR?  is this a configuration issue or a system problem?

Thank you in advance for your support.

Best regards,
Ashok

entry.title: How to download ADSP document type from SPOOL (SFP Form) and to send mail as pdf attachment
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

Same subject thread doesn't have an answer or resolution. So, creating a new thread instead of commenting or opening the old one. 

My requirement is to merge multiple PDF forms (SFP) of Deliveries into one and to send an email to the recipients.

I am creating the spools using VL71 program to generate the output of deliveries via submit program

TO SAP-SPOOL SPOOL PARAMETERS ls_print_params
                  WITHOUT SPOOL DYNPRO
                  VIA JOB lv_job_name NUMBER lv_job_no
                  AND RETURN. 

I am able to view or getting the spool number but since the document type is ADSP.  I cannot use the the FMs of 'CONVERT_OTFSPOOLJOB_2_PDF'  and 'CONVERT_ABAPSPOOLJOB_2_PDF' , as I understood, the ADSP type data is already in the converted PDF format.

Please help me out with your answers how to convert or send this ASDP data to send an email as a pdf attachment. 

Thanks & Regards,

entry.title: Unable to extend standard Fiori app
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I’m working on the standard SAP Fiori app F1643A – on SAP S/4HANA 2023 (on-premise S03).
Documentation: https://fioriappslibrary.hana.ondemand.com/sap/fix/externalViewer/#/detail/Apps('F1643A')/S30OP 

The requirement is to display some custom fields that were generated and are already available in the classic ME51N transaction.

However, in the app documentation link above, I couldn’t find the “Extension” tab, does that mean that the app cannot be extended ? or is there another way to enable those fields in this app?

Thank you in advance for your help!

entry.title: Cannot create a breakpoint in this position Elipse ADT
entry.content:
Hello, I have a small problem in my Eclipse.

A few days ago, I debugged the class ZCL_***_DPC_EXT and didn’t have any problem with that. But today, I tried to do it again, and when I set a breakpoint in the file, this message appears:

Does anybody know how I can solve this problem?

I’ve already tried these options that ChatGPT recommended to me, but none of them worked:

- Clear all breakpoints (Eclipse and SAP GUI).
- End sessions in SM04 and SM12.
- Clear the project cache (Properties → ABAP Development → Clean Cache).
- If it still fails → remove and recreate the project in the workspace.

(It's my first question in this community)

entry.title: Is it possible to change place of saving attachement in GOS?
entry.content: Hi, is it possible to change place of saving attachement in GOS? I want to save attachement in application server. Im ready to create an abap enhancements or other modifications but i dont know where to start.  I have thought that FM 'SCMS_DOC_CREATE_FILES" is good place but program doesnt stop there in debug.

entry.title: Change message type ME175 in ME35K
entry.content:
Hello,

In transaction ME35K, I’m encountering an error message that prevents the cancellation release of a contract due to the document having already been output.
Message: ME175 – “Document has already been outputted (function not possible)”

My requirement is to change this error message into a warning, so that the cancellation is not blocked.

I have already added the message code in OMAS, but it didn’t work.
I also tested several user-exits and BADIs mentioned in forums by setting breakpoints, but the program does not stop at any of them.

Could you please help me identify the correct user-exit or BADI where I can insert my code to change the message type.

Note: I’m working on S/4HANA.

Thank you in advance for your help.

entry.title: CDS Hierarchy - One level Hierarchy for SAC Dashboard development
entry.content:
Hello Everyone,

I am new to CDS development and trying to develop CDS hierarchy for EHS(IM) module. Its one level hierarchy.

Where Parent field = HazardNature and Child field = HazardType. I need to add hierarchy for Hazardtype field. This will be consumed in SAC dashboard development. I have created DIMENSION view where i am fetching both fields values from table. In HIERARCHY view i have added association to  dimension view, in CUBE view also i have added association to hazardtype field. i am getting data for all these when i execute in eclipse as a preview.

But in QUERY view if i add @AnalyticsDetails.query.displayHierarchy:#ON annotation in then the query is failing in RSRT. I have attached the code here please check and guide me where i am wrong.

RSRT Error.

 

 

Thanks

Divya

entry.title: Currency/Quantity Reference in CDS view
entry.content:
Hi,

I am trying to create a CDS view on top of the table /SAPAPO/MATLWH.

This table has a field RSQTY with unit reference to T006-MSEHI.

Now my issue is, in DDIC table the reference table needs no join to the main table. But in CDS view I am unable to use the reference Unit in "@Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure without bringing it thru an ASSOCIATION first.

And, in this case there's no common field between /SAPAPO/MATLWH and T006 using which I can define an association.

I am no CDS expert. Am I doing something wrong?

@AndreaUS - I went thru your blog but couldn't figure out a solution. Can you please help?

#ABAP #CDS

entry.title: Replacement of string '&3' not possible in CDS View
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

While creating a CDS View for outputting text elements, I stumbled upon an interesting behavior. To put it simply, I have the following string from an SAP text element:

'The limit for customer &1 was exceeded by &2 &3 at &4'

I apply the replace function four times to replace the string &1, &2, &3 and &4 with the following values:

value1 = '123456'
value2 = '100.00'
value3 = 'EUR'
value4 = '13.10.2015'
cast(replace
  (cast(replace
    (cast(replace
      (cast(replace(Text, '&1', cast(value1 as abap.char(20))) as abap.char(76)), 
    '&2', cast(value2 as abap.char(20))) as abap.char(76)), 
  '&3', cast(value3 as abap.char(20))) as abap.char(76)),
'&4', cast(value4 as abap.char(20))) as abap.char(76)) as MessageText

This logic works fine for &1, &2 and &4, while &3 is simply not replaced, regardless of the target value that is inserted. This results in the following string:

'The limit for customer 123456 was exceeded by 100.00 &3 at 13.10.2025'

Has anyone else encountered this error, or is there a better way to output text elements in CDS?

Note: I am on ABAP Version 7.58.

Thanks in advance!

BR,
Lukas

entry.title: Capacity check while putAway
entry.content:
Hello Folks,

We want to enhance BIN handling. Each BIN has a max_pallets (1 or 2) [ we ceated a tvarvc var]. In /SCWM/IF_EX_CORE_PTS_CAPACHECK~CUSTOM_CAPA_CHECK, the system shows capacity as OK when part of an HU fits ( Putaway).

The problem is: the remaining quantity needs another BIN, but the check already says OK because part of the HU is in the BIN. How can we trigger the system to search for the next BIN for the remaining quantity?

Pls advice.

Thanks!

Checked the notes 3618250, 3392556 But still no solution.
Maintained the below in /n/SCWM/ACTLOG

Is anything else missing.

entry.title: Need help to generate and send a true Excel file via email in ABAP
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I have developed an ABAP program that sends an email with an attachment in Excel format. The internal table data is being successfully converted and sent as an Excel file. However, when the recipient opens the file, the following message appears:

“The file format and extension of [filename] don’t match. The file could be corrupted or unsafe. Unless you trust its source, don’t open it. Do you want to open it anyway?”

Although the file opens correctly after confirming, the client requires the attachment to be a true Excel file (without this warning message).

Currently, I am generating the Excel by converting internal table data into a tab-delimited or comma-separated format and saving it with a .xls or .xlsx extension before attaching it to the email. I understand that this only creates a text file readable by Excel, but not a genuine Excel binary or XML file.

Could anyone please suggest the best approach to generate a true Excel file (either .xlsx format or similar) directly in ABAP and send it as an email attachment?
Are there any standard SAP classes or recommended methods (like cl_fdt_xl_spreadsheet or other approaches) to achieve this?

Any guidance or example code would be highly appreciated.
Thank you in advance for your help!

entry.title: BAPI_OUTB_DELIVERY_CREATE_STO with extension_in
entry.content:
i used the BAPI BAPI_OUTB_DELIVERY_CREATE_STO with extension_in  for LIKP Header update with custom fields ZZ.

as per the SAP documentation, i need to move the fields via badi BADI_DLV_CREATE_STO_EXTIN~ADDITIONAL_INPUT

Inside the badi, i got the custom fields, but iam not able to assign those custom fields to corresponding LIKP delivery header custom fields. The reason is likp structure is not available inside this BADI BADI_DLV_CREATE_STO_EXTIN~ADDITIONAL_INPUT.

How to achieve this, transfer custom fields via  extension_in ?

entry.title: CDS Calculate previous month from input parameter
entry.content:
I need to create CDS to calculate pervious Month / Year based on the input.

Example:

define view ZTST_PM with parameters

p_FiscalPeriod : poper,

p_Fiscalyear : gjahr

 

Expected results: Input 008 / 2025- Expected output 007 ; Previous year = 2025

period 001 / 2025- Expected output 012 ; Previous year = 2024

 

Thanks in advance for your suggestions.

entry.title: Flexible Workflow with Customer Attribute in Responsibility Definition
entry.content:
Hello Colleagues,
I am using Flexible Workflow Scenario WS02000471 in an S/4 2023 for item based release of purchase requisitions. The recipient rule is based on Teams and Responsibilities and so far everything works as expected. Now I had the requirement to add an additional customer attribute "Resp. Group ID" to the responsibility attributes. This also worked find. 

Responsibility Definition

Now we got to the point where I get stuck. How can I pass the value of my custom field "Resp. Group ID" from a purchase requisition item line to the Team finding. The value of the field has to be computed by account assignment information and I have all code in place to get the right "Resp. Group ID" per item line but how can I pass the value? I don´t get the glue where is the right place or BAdI to do so. I would need the Purchase Requisition Item Id (PO Number and Pos) to do the finding of the value and add to the Responsibility Attribute filter list. Of course I know about the BAdI to set the Approvers in the Workflow step but if I use this I would need to query the Teams and Responsibilities by my code and I would expect there is a more elegant way - hopefully.

Any help or hints appreciated and many thanks for your efforts.

Roman

entry.title: Pass an xml via post request for SAP Gateway project
entry.content:
Hi All,

I created a gateway project to consume a RFC function module ( which has an import param (string) and export Param String). In the "/IWBEP/IF_MGW_APPL_SRV_RUNTIME~CREATE_DEEP_ENTITY" , I have written the code to call the RFC FM. Inside the FM , we have CALL TRANSFORMATION  to Transform XML to internal tables .

various validations are done and the xml is built n passed  to the export parameter.

This works when i execute the Fm via se37.

However when I call it via gateway I am struggling. How do I use the xml as post request?

entry.title: Error with BAdI Implementation PRCG_DOC_ITEM_CONDITION_AMOUNT
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I’m currently implementing the BAdI PRCG_DOC_ITEM_CONDITION_AMOUNT in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition. My goal is to include custom logic for calculating the condition type TPE1.

Here’s what I’ve done so far:

  • In the BAdI implementation, I inserted my logic for condition TPE1 and assigned the enhancement ID FORMULA=TPE1. (see screenshot placeholder)

  • After publishing the BAdI, I went to the configuration activity Set Alternative Calculation of Condition Amount (102430)
  • I created a new calculation routine with the number 3009999 and linked it to the enhancement identifier TPE1, which I had used in the BAdI. (see screenshot placeholder)
 

 

  • Then, I assigned this routine in the pricing procedure under the Condition Amount calculation field.

However, when I test the BAdI during pricing execution, I get the following unexpected error message:

“Enhancement identifier for routine number 3009999 must exist.”

Based on the error details, you recommend implementing the PRCG_DOC_CONDITION_AMOUNT BADI alongside the previous BADI and assigning it the same routine. But I haven't seen this implementation in the examples.

I’ve already double-checked the enhancement ID and configuration, but I couldn’t find any additional details or documentation related to this specific error.

Has anyone faced a similar issue with this BAdI or the linkage between the enhancement ID and the routine number in the configuration? Any insights or troubleshooting steps would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks in advance for your help!

Best regards,
